resources.string: This is a navigation application. It allows the robot to navigate an environment looking for targets while avoiding obstacles. It has two modules to avoid the obstacles: (1)the robot’s front proximity sensors and (2)the camera + Optical Flow.\nAdd at least two targets and then tap on “start”. This makes the robot go between all the targets in its list, while avoiding the obstacles.\nhttp://www.wheelphone.com
Sorry, could not access the camera. Please close/kill the application that is locking the camera and try again
Sorry, it seems the device does not have a camera, this application is useless without it, :(.
Use proximity sensors for obstacle avoidance
